title: Ambigram commission
content:
Good evening,

In searching for ambigram designs, I came across the Typophile website. I was wondering if anyone with ambigram experience either knows someone who could create an ambigram for me or would be willing to do so. I would very much like to commission a particular piece.

Thank you, in advance,  
Jill

 [‹ Best application for "offline" fonts browsing/cataloguing...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719172820/http:/typophile.com/node/42151 "Go to previous forum topic") [Rock Band - Typography affecting my enjoyment of things. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719172820/http:/typophile.com/node/42145 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jill angel
